title: No Poverty
description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere by ensuring equal access to economic resources and services.

charts.title: Global Poverty Rate
Poverty Rate by Region

government_initiatives: The National Rural Livelihoods Mission (NRLM) aimed at increasing the income of rural households.
Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana for affordable housing.
Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) to improve welfare services.
individual_actions: Donate to credible poverty alleviation programs.
Support local businesses to encourage economic growth in your community.
Volunteer at local shelters or organizations fighting poverty.

other_initiatives.description: Provides financial and technical assistance to developing countries to reduce poverty.
Global programs to eradicate extreme poverty by 2030.

solutions: Empowering women through education and employment opportunities.
Investing in agriculture and rural development.
Ensuring equal access to resources and services, like healthcare and education.

title: Zero Hunger
description: End hunger, achieve food security, improve nutrition, and promote sustainable agriculture.

charts.title: Global Malnutrition Rates
Food Insecurity by Region

government_initiatives: The Midday Meal Scheme provides meals to school children.
National Food Security Act ensures food grains at subsidized prices.
Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana to improve irrigation and ensure food production.
individual_actions: Reduce food waste by only buying what you need.
Donate surplus food to food banks or shelters.
Support local farmers by buying locally sourced food.

other_initiatives.description: Provides food assistance to countries facing extreme hunger.
Helps countries achieve food security and ensure good nutrition for all.

solutions: Improving agricultural productivity through innovation and technology.
Ensuring sustainable food production systems.
Implementing social safety nets to protect vulnerable populations.

title: Good Health and Well-Being
description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages.

charts.title: Global Life Expectancy
Mortality Rate by Region

government_initiatives: Ayushman Bharat for universal health coverage.
The National Health Mission to improve maternal and child health services.
Mission Indradhanush to increase vaccination rates.
individual_actions: Maintain a healthy diet and lifestyle.
Get regular health check-ups.
Advocate for public health programs in your community.

other_initiatives.description: Works to ensure global health standards are maintained.
Provides medical assistance in conflict zones and countries facing health crises.

solutions: Strengthening healthcare infrastructure in developing regions.
Promoting preventive healthcare and vaccinations.
Addressing mental health and well-being as part of overall health strategies.

title: Quality Education
description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.

charts.title: Global Literacy Rates
Access to Education by Region

government_initiatives: Samagra Shiksha to improve the quality of education.
Digital India initiatives to enhance access to educational resources.
The Right to Education Act ensures free and compulsory education for children aged 6-14.
individual_actions: Volunteer to tutor students from underprivileged backgrounds.
Support initiatives aimed at providing educational resources to underserved communities.
Advocate for inclusive education policies.

other_initiatives.description: Works to ensure all children have access to quality education.
Funds programs to improve education systems in developing countries.

solutions: Providing affordable and accessible education for all.
Improving teacher training and resources.
Incorporating digital education tools and technologies.

title: gender-equality
description: Gender equality is about ensuring that all individuals, regardless of gender, have equal rights, opportunities, and respect.

charts.title: some key statistics about gender equality over the years and projected into the future
Economic Participation and Opportunity

government_initiatives: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao (BBBP): A campaign to address the declining child sex ratio and promote the education of girls.
Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana: Provides clean cooking fuel to women, reducing health hazards associated with traditional cooking methods.
Stand-Up India: A scheme to support women entrepreneurs by facilitating bank loans.
Swachh Bharat Mission: Improves sanitation facilities, benefiting women and girls.
individual_actions: Educate Yourself and Others: Understand gender issues and share that knowledge.
Challenge Gender Stereotypes: Speak up against stereotypes and biases.
Vote and Advocate: Support policies and leaders who promote gender equality.

other_initiatives.description: Focuses on women's leadership, economic security, ending violence against women, and peacebuilding.
Researches and promotes gender equality in business and society.

solutions: Ensure women and men have equal opportunities in education and employment.
Advocate for laws that support gender equality, such as equal pay legislation and anti-discrimination policies.
Encourage workplaces to adopt flexible work arrangements that support both men and women in balancing work and personal responsibilities.

title: Clean water and sanitation
description: Clean water and sanitation mean ensuring everyone has access to safe drinking water and adequate sanitation facilities to promote health and prevent diseases.

charts.title: global progress in increasing access to clean water.
Access to sanitation
Regional Data on Clean water
Regional Data on sanitation

government_initiatives: Swachh Bharat Mission (Gramin): Launched in 2014, this mission aimed to make India Open Defecation Free (ODF) by constructing over 100 million individual household toilets.
Jal Jeevan Mission: Aims to provide safe and adequate drinking water through individual household tap connections by 2024.
individual_actions: Conserve Water: Be mindful of your water usage. Fix leaks, take shorter showers,and use water-efficient fixtures.
Practice Good Hygiene: Adopt and promote proper handwashing and sanitation practices.
Reduce Pollution: Properly dispose of waste and avoid using harmful chemicals that can contaminate water sources.

other_initiatives.description: Provides guidelines and support for water safety and sanitation practices globally.
it works globally to provide safe water, sanitation, and hygiene (WASH) services, especially in schools and communities.

solutions: Improve and build water supply and sanitation systems.
Educate communities on hygiene practices and water conservation.
Use technology to monitor water quality and reduce wastage.

title: Affordable and clean energy
description: Affordable and clean energy ensures everyone has access to sustainable, cost-effective power while protecting the environment.

charts.title: Global Data on Affordable and Clean Energy.
Regional Data on Affordable and Clean Energy

government_initiatives: National Water Mission: Part of India's National Action Plan on Climate Change, focusing on water conservation, minimizing wastage, and ensuring equitable distribution.
Jal Jeevan Mission: Aims to provide safe and adequate drinking water through individual household tap connections by 2024.
individual_actions: Reduce Energy Consumption: Turn off lights, unplug devices when not in use, and opt for energy-efficient appliances.
Use Public Transport or Carpool: Reduce your carbon footprint by choosing sustainable transportation options.
Invest in Green Technologies: Support businesses and innovations that focus on clean energy.

other_initiatives.description: A network of organizations and individuals working to promote sustainable water management.
Promotes sustainable sanitation solutions worldwide.

solutions: Governments, businesses, and individuals should invest in solar, wind, hydro, and geothermal energy sources.
Upgrade buildings, appliances, and industrial processes to be more energy-efficient.
Implement smart grid technology to efficiently distribute and manage energy.

title: Decent Work And Economic Growth
description: Decent work and economic growth mean ensuring everyone has access to fair employment opportunities that drive sustainable economic progress.

charts.title: Global Data on Decent Work and Economic Growth(GDP).
Global Data on Decent Work and Economic Growth(Employment Rate).
Global Data on Decent Work and Economic Growth(Unemployement Rate).
Regional Data on Decent Work and Economis Growth(GDP).
Regional Data on Decent Work and Economis Growth(Employement).
Regional Data on Decent Work and Economis Growth(Youth Unemployment).

government_initiatives: Atmanirbhar Bharat Rojgar Yojana (ABRY): Launched in 2020, this scheme aims to provide employment opportunities and support businesses affected by the COVID-19 pandemic.

Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA): Provides at least 100 days of wage employment in a financial year to every rural household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.
individual_actions: Support Local Businesses: Buy from small and local businesses to boost the economy.
Invest in Education: Enhance your skills and encourage others to pursue education and training.
Stay Informed: Educate yourself about the issues affecting workers and economies, and share that knowledge.

other_initiatives.description: Future of Work Initiative: Examines the changing nature of work and proposes solutions to ensure decent work for all.
Global Partnership for Financial Inclusion (GPFI): Works to improve access to finance for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), which are crucial for job creation.

solutions: Create job opportunities for underrepresented groups, including women, youth, and persons with disabilities.
Invest in education and training programs to improve workforce skills.
Ensure access to healthcare, unemployment benefits, and pensions.

title: INDUSTRY,INNOVATION,INFRASTRUCTURE
description: Industry, innovation, and infrastructure drive sustainable economic growth and resilience by fostering modern industries, technological advancements, and robust infrastructure systems.

charts.title: Global Data on Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure(Industrial Production Growth).
Global Data on Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure(Research and Development Expenditure).
Global Data on Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure(Access to infrastrcture).
Regional Data on Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure(Industrial Production Growth).
Regional Data on Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure(Research and Development Expenditure).
Regional Data on Industry, Innovation, and Infrastructure(Access to infrastrcture).

government_initiatives: Make in India: Launched to facilitate investment, foster innovation, enhance skill development, protect intellectual property, and build best-in-class manufacturing infrastructure.
Pandit Deendayal Upadhyay Shramev Jayate Karyakram: Focuses on improving the working conditions and welfare of workers.
individual_actions: Support Local Businesses: Buy locally-made products to boost local industries.
Educate Yourself and Others: Learn about the importance of infrastructure and innovation, and spread that knowledge.
Support STEM Education: Encourage and support education in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.

other_initiatives.description: Fostering partnerships between government and private sector to undertake large-scale infrastructure projects and drive economic growth.
Collaborating with international organizations to share knowledge, resources, and technology for sustainable development.

solutions: Develop and upgrade infrastructure, including transportation, energy, and ICT, to enhance connectivity and promote sustainable development.
Increase funding for R&D to drive technological advancements and support innovative solutions.
Provide financial support and incentives for startups and businesses investing in innovative solutions.

title: Affordable and clean energy
description: Affordable and clean energy ensures everyone has access to sustainable, cost-effective power while protecting the environment.

charts.title: Global Data on Affordable and Clean Energy.
Regional Data on Affordable and Clean Energy

government_initiatives: National Water Mission: Part of India's National Action Plan on Climate Change, focusing on water conservation, minimizing wastage, and ensuring equitable distribution.
Jal Jeevan Mission: Aims to provide safe and adequate drinking water through individual household tap connections by 2024.
individual_actions: Reduce Energy Consumption: Turn off lights, unplug devices when not in use, and opt for energy-efficient appliances.
Use Public Transport or Carpool: Reduce your carbon footprint by choosing sustainable transportation options.
Invest in Green Technologies: Support businesses and innovations that focus on clean energy.

other_initiatives.description: A network of organizations and individuals working to promote sustainable water management.
Promotes sustainable sanitation solutions worldwide.

solutions: Governments, businesses, and individuals should invest in solar, wind, hydro, and geothermal energy sources.
Upgrade buildings, appliances, and industrial processes to be more energy-efficient.
Implement smart grid technology to efficiently distribute and manage energy.
